title: Project Overview
content: Xfnite is a building labeling project where workers label roofs and building shapes in satellite maps. Work is flexible and paid per qualified output.

title: Getting Started
content: Attend Live Sessions, complete 22 Hands-on Training tasks, join Orientation, then start working on projects.

title: Requirements
content: Internet connection (DSL/Fiber/VPN/HTTP Injector/LTE Pocket Wifi or Modem), unlimited data, PC or laptop with mouse, good moral character, analytical skills for building/house shapes.

title: Work Hours
content: 2-8 hours a day or 10-20 days a month. Must complete 40 hours per month cycle. Hours are flexible.

title: Rates and Pay
content: Base rate is $2 per 800 qualified features. Experienced labelers earn up to $3-$6+ per hour. Payout is every 4 weeks.

title: Charges
content: Service fee 4%, Management fee P115 ($2), Admin fee 12%.

title: Review Process
content: Work is reviewed by Checkers then approved by Judgers.

title: Training Overview
content: Training takes 2 days and includes: Pre-course Exam, Live Training Module, Rules and Guidelines, Land Cover Training, and Actual Live Labeling with Pay.

title: Installation Steps
content: Go to User Profile. Click Show Password. Get your Ginger ID and Password and save them in a Notepad.

title: Software Installation
content: Install 7-zip. Extract Visual-C-Runtimes-All-in-One.zip. Open the folder and run Install_all.bat until finished.

title: Training Videos
content: Watch all training videos to be equipped for Hands-on Training: Basic Labeling guide (Part 1: Labeling Basics, Part 2: Techniques, Part 3: Switching, Part 4: Task Overview), 3D and Multilayer guide (Part 1: Basic 3D Guide, Part 2: How to draw 3D Lines, Part 3: 3D Overview).

title: Live Training Sessions
content: Attend live training sessions at 8:00AM - 9:30AM, 10:00AM - 11:30AM, and 12:00PM - 1:30PM.

title: Login Steps
content: Open ginger-2018.exe, enter Ginger ID and Password from Notepad, update if prompted, restart, press Arrow Down or Download icon to start tasks.

title: Verification
content: After Hands-on Training, fill out the Verification Form. Wait for Cedrick Sabrine to verify your account to access the Rules and Guidelines.

title: Troubleshooting
content: If Bitmappro does not open, wait for registration. If invalid Ginger ID, check spaces and copy from Bitmappro. For installation errors, redownload files, move them to Drive C, disable antivirus, restart WiFi, and update Windows.

title: Community
content: Join XF Trainees Facebook group and community chat. Refer to the Answer Key document for guidance.

title: Additional Resources
content: Join our Facebook group for XF Trainees: https://www.facebook.com/groups/xftraining. Refer to the Answer Key Document for additional guides.

title: Xfnite Full Training & Application Info
content: Welcome to Xfnite! Hiring 400 slots only. Training starts December 1, 2025. Steps: 01 Attend Live Session, 02 Take Hands-on Training, 03 Join Orientation, 04 Start Working. Requirements: Internet, unlimited data, PC/laptop, good moral character, building shape analysis skills. Minimum system: Quad Core, 8GB RAM, Windows 7/10/11. Work Hours: 2-8 hours/day, 10-20 days/month. Rates: $2 per 800 features, up to $3-$6+/hour. Time monitoring, charges, review process, training phases 1-5, expected income, and modes of salary payment detailed. Follow application steps: Like FB Page, share opportunity, join training FB group, subscribe YouTube channel, take Precourse Exam.

title: Part of the company, management, employees, and workers, owners.
content: Cedrick Sabrine, Ey Dacanay, Joni Baldon, and other employees of the company.
